action_title: Build artificial bird perches to encourage seed dispersal
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects on peatland vegetation of building artificial bird perches. The study was in a tropical peat swamp.
Vegetation cover (1 study): One replicated, paired, controlled study in a peat swamp forest in IndonesiaÂ found that artificial bird perches had no significant effect on seedling abundance.
